key.name: rules
key.description: JSON array of rule objects. Each rule has: - "wm_class": regex matched against WM_CLASS - "title_pattern": regex with a capture group; captured text is the identity for color hashing

key.name: color-overrides
key.description: JSON object mapping override keys ("wm_class:identity") to hex color strings ("#rrggbb"). These take precedence over hash-based colors.
